message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.ST, cs.IT, cs.SY

This paper deals with decision making and information gathering, which are common topics in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The use of performance bounds and characterization of gains suggests a focus on optimization and statistical analysis, which are also relevant to the fields of statistics and information theory. The mention of adaptive policies suggests a possible connection to control systems and robotics. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.ST (Statistics). The sub-categories cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.SY (Systems and Control) are also possible due to the focus on optimization and decision making.
